mick88/filemanager,open,Copyright violation,[],"Hi @mick88
I found [this app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.farmaapps.filemanager) on the Play Store. Is it a version based on your own app (it looks the same...) ?

If this is the case, and because you are the owner of the source code, feel free to open a request to google [here](https://support.google.com/legal/contact/lr_dmca?product=googleplay) to remove the false app from the Store, if it's your wish ;)
Don't forget to tell Google that:
* The app is licensed under MIT license and this guy is violating it;
* He is falsely claiming he made the app.
* Do not forget to provide a link to this repo."
mick88/filemanager,open,search Bar,[],
mick88/filemanager,open,"""Folder could not be created"" on extSdCard on Samsung Galaxy S5 Android 5.0",[],"1. Go into folder on external card
2. Create new folder
Expected: folder created
Actual: error with message ""Folder could not be created""
Notes:
1. Build in ""My Files"" file manager created folder in same situation
2. Same with https://github.com/openintents/filemanager/issues/55
3. Card is visible under ""storage/extSdCard"" name
4. Folder is created well on build in memory card
5. SD card worked well on other phones with Androids 4.X

mick88/filemanager,closed,Added German Translation,[],Hi, I'm using your filemanager on my tablet. So I thought its a good idea to translate it in my language. If its ok for you, I will watch your project and will translate new strings when they come.
BR
mick88/filemanager,open,Saved current directory - start application next day - no check for missing folder,[],I believe the behavior of the app is such:
1. You are working in folder /sdcard/Folder1
2. Exit App
3. Delete folder /sdcard/Folder1 using an outside app or event.
4. Start App - it tries to set default to the now missing folder.
The same sort of thing happens if you change out SDCard and the path is not on both cards.
Adding a File exists check on preference read should solve this - and default to the other paths.
Thanks for the App!
